tasks.task: Assembling and using a garden tower for vertical gardening
subtasks: Checking if there is enough soil to fill the garden tower
Watering the soil in the garden tower to facilitate the proper water distribution system
Planting the strawberries in the garden tower
Filling the garden tower with soil, adhering to the recommended depth
Ensuring the garden tower is placed in a location with adequate sunlight, specifically a south-facing deck near the kitchen
Considering the purchase of an upgrade kit (though not installed in this case)

tasks.task: Using the garden tower to compost food scraps
subtasks: Positioning the garden tower near the kitchen for easy access
Collecting food scraps to place in the garden tower
Ensuring the placement of food scraps in the designated area of the garden tower for composting
